body: Here is konkit's series order https://nhentai.net/g/237291/23/ thank me later

Actually not just chapter 2. The whole story has been running since 2009, longest running hentai that I know, and kon-kit is still releasing new chapters. The problem is, he has half a dozen ongoing stories, and his stories aren't simply collected in like "one book, one story". Nope, they are all over the place, you have to go through all of his books to read through all the chapters of one of his stories. But that's not really a bad thing, because that way you also get to see his other stories which are also pure gold. It's just annoying if you want to read through all chapters of a certain story in one go. That's not possible, you have to go through all books. This is kon-kit's first book, it has the beginning of this story in chapter 2: https://nhentai.net/g/67387/
is there a link that has the whole series in it? I can only find this chapter
@Gifmemoarhentai Im fucking raping you that's what's happen
There really should be a Tank just for these chapters so people can figure all of this out...
This is a seriously long-running gag comic at this point. go look up the earlier chapters!
